Articles.Content:
a few hours ago i wanted to make something in KSP that looked like a dalek in some way shape or form, i cant say i did well but i think it is worth at least posting it, i am realy bad at using the ship designer to make something that resembles something

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32454[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32455[/ATTACH]

if you think i am good at this say so i am probably not

YOU ARE BADLY IMITATING THE DALEKS? YOU MUST BE EXTERMINATED!

(No, quite creative in reality. Good job!)
After watching the new dr who episode (first time watching dw) i loved it, and now this!
Moved to the Spacecraft exchange as this doesn't really qualify as fan-works. Consider uploading the craft file too.
I have watched doctor who ever since he first met Rose, it was sad when he regenerated both times. awesome though
Give me .craft, I need to reproduce them in great numbers. :]

EX-TER-MIN-ATE!

As the ninth Doctor would say, "Fantastic!" I've been wondering if anyone had possibly done anything like a Doctor Who mod pack or perhaps made a TARDIS craft(not sure how that would work, but...hey...) And I always thought the Dalek would be the easiest since it looks the most..."rockety..."

Kudos! Do please share the .craft file.

EX-TER-MIN-ATE!

As the ninth Doctor would say, "Fantastic!" I've been wondering if anyone had possibly done anything like a Doctor Who mod pack or perhaps made a TARDIS craft(not sure how that would work, but...hey...) And I always thought the Dalek would be the easiest since it looks the most..."rockety..."

Kudos! Do please share the .craft file.

If someone came up with the TARDIS in kerbal
There is a tardis mod. Not sure if it is 0.16 compatible.

If someone came up with the TARDIS in kerbal

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iCtExHZFyuY

http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.net/downloads/tardis.rar

I was just about to post that I found a TARDIS mod after a quick Google search, then Awaras beat me to it. ha It is, indeed, v .16 compatible. It even makes the sound! The one downside is, apparently, while the crew is inside, as proved by crashing it, they can't EVA.(Possibly a way to mod that in?)... But, TARDIS...

Ok, sorry to derail thread... Moving on...

Edited September 12, 2012 by Fredonia
